presentation.v1: I started programming personal projects at eighteen. I'm currently studying a Higher Degree in Multiplatform Application Development along with an algorithmic programming course at Complutense University of Madrid. I'm twenty-one years old and from Valladolid (Castilla y León).
presentation.v2: I can adapt to any programming language. I believe in the importance of TDD, documentation, and good development practices.

thefluentspanishhouse.name: The Fluent Spanish House
thefluentspanishhouse.description: Spanish language academy featuring social media integration, blog, private class subscriptions, and Mailchimp-powered newsletter with digital marketing implementation. Built with React and TypeScript (.tsx).

olimpiadas-informaticas.name: Spanish Informatics Olympiad
olimpiadas-informaticas.description: Competitive programming online classes from UCM (Complutense University of Madrid) with C++ and Java exercises

elend-talk.name: PDF Chat
elend-talk.description: Real-time chat system with Ollama and Deepseek for PDF analysis, featuring file uploads and chat history. Built with Astro and SvelteKit

bytes-colaborativos.name: BytesColaborativos
bytes-colaborativos.description: Java projects using SpringBoot, Spring Security, JWT, Swagger/Javadoc documentation, Kafka queues, etc. Community-driven initiatives from BytesColaborativos

experience.title: Experience
experience.description: I have hands-on experience with programming languages and frameworks such as C++, Java, JavaScript, TypeScript, Astro, and React. I've developed significant projects using each of these technologies, gaining robust knowledge in software development principles and practices.
experience.technologies: Additionally, I've worked extensively with tools and platforms including MongoDB, Firebase, Vercel, Cloudflare, Tailwind, Node.js, virtual machines, Git, GitHub, and continuous integration via GitHub Actions. I also have experience collaborating on team projects using Jira for project management and workflow coordination.

jobs.title: Internship, Unreal Engine 5 Developer
jobs.description: Developing a rally-inspired solar system simulation using Unreal Engine 5 with Blueprint and C++.

jobs.title: Internship, New Technologies Technical Support
jobs.description: Full tech inventory restoration. Developed VBA scripts for equipment identification and registration to optimize data collection and organization. Collaborated on administrative tasks and technical support for IT asset management. Initiated efficiency improvements that enhanced inventory accuracy and processing times.
